text: Well now, wait a minute.
Polar bear fur, rat pack music, fancy cup?
I know whose car this is, we gotta go!
Why, whose car is it?
The most feared crime boss in Tundratown,
they call him "Mr. Big",
and he does not like me, so we gotta go!
I'm not leaving, this is a crime scene.
Well it's gonna be an even bigger crime scene
if Mr. Big finds me here, so we're leaving, right now!
(yells)
Raymond, and is that Kevin?
Long time no see, and speaking of no see
how about you forget you saw me, huh,
for old time's sake?
That's a no...
(car drives)
(music playing over radio)
Oh. (Raymond laughs)
What'd you do that made Mr. Big so mad at you?
I, um, may have sent him a very expensive wool rug
that was made from the fur of a skunk'sss butt.
Oh, sweet cheese and crackers...
